TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Engine extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been deprecated. Please use Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ProjectCollection from the Microsoft.Build assembly instead.")

Docs.summary: Represents the MSBuild engine.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在系統中的專案對專案相依性，<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine>維護建置專案，讓您可以避免在同一個專案相同的目標建置一次以上指定的組建。
## Examples 下列範例會建立<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine>物件，並使用<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.BuildProjectFile%2A>方法，以建置專案檔。 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.FileLogger>類別用來將資訊記錄到檔案。
[!code-csharp[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BuildAProject/CS/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BuildAProject/VB/Module1.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Otherwise, you can define custom toolsets in the registry or config file, or by adding elements to the Engine's ToolsetCollection. Then use either the Engine() or Engine(ToolsetLocations) constructor instead.")

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup globalProperties, valuetype Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetDefinitionLocations locations, int32 numberOfCpus, string localNodeProviderParameters) cil managed
Public Sub New (globalProperties As BuildPropertyGroup, locations As ToolsetDefinitionLocations, numberOfCpus As Integer, localNodeProviderParameters As String)

public: Engine(Microsoft::Build::BuildEngine::BuildPropertyGroup ^ globalProperties, Microsoft::Build::BuildEngine::ToolsetDefinitionLocations locations, int numberOfCpus, System::String ^ localNodeProviderParameters);

Docs.param: A that represents properties to be passed to the child engine.
A enumeration specifies the location of the Toolset definition.
An integer that specifies the number of CPUs or cores in the system.

A string of parameters that are used to configure the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine. You must format the parameters as ParameterName=ParameterValue. The valid semicolon-separated, optional parameters are as follows: Indicates where the build process can find MSBuild.exe. This path enables the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine to locate MSBuild.exe and start it as a local node. is the only essential parameter for a host. The default value is C:\Windows\Microsoft.Net\Framework\v3.5\\.
Indicates whether the child nodes should remain after the build finishes, in case they can be used later by another build. The nodes are discarded automatically after one minute of non-use. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BinPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BinPath : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Avoid setting BinPath. If you were simply passing in the .NET Framework location as the BinPath, no other action is necessary. Otherwise, define Toolsets instead in the registry or config file, or by adding elements to the Engine's ToolsetCollection, in order to use a custom BinPath.")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the path to MSBuild.exe.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 3.5"ToolsPath。 」 取代 「 bin 路徑 」 因此，在。目標檔案，請使用 MSBuildToolsPath，而不是 MBBuildBinPath。 在 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]物件模型中，您正在執行的工具組與 「 bin 路徑 」。 若要從建置引擎取得路徑步驟如下所示：
1. 取得預設工具版本。
2. 取得工具組對應。
3. 尋找工具組，並根據在對應中的字串。
4. 取得工具組。
5. 從工具組中取得的路徑。
如果您要建立的引擎，則不需要執行此程序。 在此情況下，您已經知道的工具組路徑。
因為方案中的專案可以使用不同的工具組，您也可以取得 MSBuild.exe 的路徑從專案，如下所示。
``` project.EvaluatedProperties[ReservedPropertyNames.toolsPath].FinalValue ```
如需有關工具組的詳細資訊，請參閱`MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`。

MemberSignature.Usage: engine.BuildProjectFile (projectFile, targetNames, globalProperties, targetOutputs, buildFlags, toolsVersion)

Docs.param: The name of the project to build.
A array of targets for each project. Can be if you want to build the default targets for the project.
An array of properties for each project. Can be if no global properties are required.
A array of tables for target outputs. Can be if outputs are not required.
A string array of additional build flags.
The ToolsVersion to impose on the project in this build.
Docs.summary: Loads a project file from disk and builds the given targets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載會採用一組全域屬性中的每個要用於建置的專案，會傳回目標輸出中，而且也可讓呼叫者指定其他組建旗標。

A array of targets for each project.
An array of properties for each project. This value cannot be .
A array of tables for target outputs. This value cannot be .
A string array of additional build flags.
The ToolsVersion to impose on the project in this build.

Docs.returns: if the project built successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載會採用一組全域屬性中的每個要用於建置的專案，會傳回目標輸出中，而且也可讓呼叫者指定其他組建旗標。

Docs.summary: The default ToolsVersion of this build engine.
Docs.value: 表示預設 ToolsVersion 的字串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它們不否則會獲告知要使用哪一個 ToolsVersion，專案會使用此工具版本。 這個值擷取自。 .exe.config 檔案或登錄。 如果未指定預設 ToolsVersion，則版本是硬式編碼為版本"2.0"。 如需 ToolsVersion 的詳細資訊，請參閱[專為特定版本的.NET Framework 建置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8)。

Public Function GetLoadedProject (projectFullFileName As String) As Project

Docs.summary: Returns the object that is associated with the specified project file.
Docs.returns: The object that associated with the specified project file. If no object is associated with the specified project file, the method returns a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 全域屬性，則會使用設定的屬性 **/property**開啟 命令列或整合式的開發環境 (IDE) 之前建置專案時所設定的屬性。 這些全域屬性會套用至所有使用此建置的專案<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine>。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是安全執行緒。 若要確保一致的行為，建置開始之前，應該註冊所有記錄器。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[撰寫能夠辨識多處理器的記錄器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff987d1b-1798-4803-9ef6-cc8fcc263516)。

Docs.param: The logger to associate with the .
Docs.summary: Registers the specified logger with the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 當已註冊記錄器<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine>，它會接收所有建置事件。
若要取消註冊記錄器，請使用<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.UnregisterAllLoggers%2A>方法。
## Examples 下列範例會建立<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine>物件，並使用<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.BuildProjectFile%2A>方法，以建置專案檔。 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.FileLogger>類別用來將資訊記錄到檔案。

Docs.summary: Called when the host is finished with this build engine. It unregisters loggers and shuts down nodes.

Docs.summary: Unregisters all loggers from the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.UnregisterAllLoggers%2A>方法呼叫<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger.Shutdown%2A>方法之前取消註冊每個從每個已註冊記錄器<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine>。
## Examples 下列範例會建立<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine>物件，並使用<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.BuildProjectFile%2A>方法，以建置專案檔。 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.FileLogger>類別用來將資訊記錄到檔案。
